Perceptor/Hydras/Darkhawk


Hydras was furious  looking to allthe presents =
in the place looked as if he desires to kill them all 

"A piece of junk an=
d a rodent... YOU ARE A GOOD FOR NOTHING!!!!! " Shouted mad Hdyras "the onl=
y thing right that you have done is avoid that the special prision still re=
main in our grasp"

Perceptor Ran  inside the lab and checked th stasis pod=
 altought the energy was shut down for few seconds, the femme wasnt damaged=
 at least that revealed the quick scan. Darkhawk Feel ashamed for the defea=
t and furious for it.

The spider bots started to repair the damaged base. =





From: Sandy 
Sent: Monday, March 01, 2010 10:17 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogro=
ups.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
Through the bla=
st, Tucson had managed to stay on his wheels. Yet, he spins somewhat due to=
 the impact but is quickly righted by Rat Trap who is now inside him, as he=
 floors the pedal to the metal, getting Tucson into the shuttle, via a ramp=
 that Quickstride releases for a short moment of time. He comes to a screec=
hing halt inside, as he jumps out quickly.

" Just in time Lord Elder, I th=
ought we were done for!" 

Quickstride rushes right over to Tucson and asse=
sses his condition. He frantically tries to find an emergency energy line t=
hat will fit into his gas port.

"Holy slag.. Just an hour more and he woul=
d've been ready for the Autobot graveyard. Hang in there big guy, you're sa=
fe now."

Rat Trap notices a fuel door poping open. 

"There, that's his fu=
el port. Did ya bring any energon?"

Quickstride nodds, as he lets down a c=
anister of energon.

"Hmm, just about ten gallon's worth of fuel, which sho=
uld last 'em till we get back to the Ark. The backup battery is gonna need =
at least forty eight hours to recharge... I think."

Quickstride hooks Tucs=
on to the emergency Energon tank, and slowly introduces it to his system. T=
ucson remains in SUV form to conserve the remainder of what he had left in =
his emergency tank.

Rat Trap sits beside Tucson and doesn't move.

" If ya=
 don't mind, I'd like ta stay with Wheels. I wanna make sure he comes outa =
this okay."

Quickstride nodds, and leaves Rat Trap with Tucson while retur=
ning to Lord Elder.

" It's kinda nice ta see Rat Trap bonding with someone=
, especially an Autobot. He's got a hard time makn' friends, so any friend =
he makes, is a good thing. The big guy will be okay, but I think it'll take=
 'em a while before he's a hundred percent."

Rat Trap turns to Quickstride=
 and Lord Elder.

" And I'll be right there when he recovers. After all, on=
ce he gets to the Ark, he'll feel a whole lot better."

The word "Ark somew=
hat brings Tucson around. Yet he remains in SUV form.

"Ark.. Optimus Prime=
..."

Rat Trap puts his hand on Tucson's hood.

"That's right Wheels, that'=
s right. Lord Elder has been guardn' the Ark for ya so that if by chance, a=
n Autobot was still functioning, it would be kept safe for them until they =
could get back in action. "

Tucson backs up and tries to face Lord Elder.
=

" I owe Lord Elder my utmost gratitude. If - you had not guarded the - Ark=
, all would - have been lost. I - thank you deeply for your
loyalty, and - =
constant vigil over the Autobot vessel. Once I - figure out how to revive m=
y comrades, I - will be sure they know of your valliant efforts to - protec=
t what is most precious to us. R - Rat Tap. You too, have - shown bravery i=
n your actions. I owe you as much, if not more of my loyalty to you. withou=
t - your help, I would not have gotten out of that fortress."

Rat Trap tri=
es to hold back what appears to be tears.

"Aw gee Wheels, ain't nothn'. Wh=
at're friends for?"

Quickstride secures Tucson so he does not damage his f=
rame any further.

"Easy big guy, you've gotten enough dents for one day."
=

Tucson sighs.

" Sorry, I - didn't know there was a third comrade aboard. =
Thank you for your help. I will be sure to remember to reward you when all =
is said - and done."

Rat Trap transforms into his rat form, and sits up on=
to Tucson's hood.

"Hope this doesn't hurt Wheels, but I can talk to ya a l=
ot better on your hood."

Tucson remains perfectly still.

"Not - at all. L=
ord Elder, I - have one favor to ask you. I'd - like to pay my respects to =
Optimus - Prime once we arrive at the Ark. Do - I have permission to enter =
the Ark to do so?"

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Preston Carroll <supercy=
clonus@...> wrote:
>
> > " I intend to finish what I started, I will finish=
 my mission,
> > but after that, do not expect me to have the same amount
>=
 > of respect for you when this is all over Rodimus. But now,
> > is not th=
e time for that. I see that what I accomplished was
> > just the first phas=
e. I've accomplished that thus far. I've
> > learned for myself what needs =
to be done, and what needs
> > to be done can't be completed today. That wi=
ll have to wait."
> >
> >
> > " I believe this is where you step asside Rod=
imus, and let us pass."
> 
> Rodimus stood before Tuscon, weapon drawn and =
ready as the Autobot
> went through his soliloquy, the look on his face har=
d and resolute.
> The Rodimus that stands there, is not exactly the Rodimus=
 Tuscon had
> once known, the Predacon programing had twisted him, inverted=
 his
> thoughts, changed him in ways that even he found surprising in some
=
> ways.
> 
> However even now as this lone Autobot spoke about dedication a=
nd
> courage, there was a part of him that was opened for a moment, as if
>=
 for the briefest of seconds a part of the old Rodimus briefly made an
> ap=
pearance . . .
> 
> "NO Autobot, this is where you face termination!" Cyclo=
nus spoke as he
> and Scourge caught up, breaking into Rodimus' revelry "It=
 is time to
> finish this!"
> 
> "Yes" Said Skorponok as he stepped out of =
the room, weapons already
> orienting on the Autobot. "He thinks he's Optim=
us Prime" Scorponok
> said, his voice sarcastic and mocking, "But he is onl=
y a pale copy."
> He chuckled, "But I do so look forward to his dissection.=
"
> 
> Scourge just chuckled darkly as he approached, his rifle pointed at
=
> Tuscon and Rat Trap!
> 
> (Meanwhile in the Autobot shuttle)
> 
> > Quick=
stride gets the shuttle airbourne and sets the course
> > for the tower. He=
 tries to lock in on an Autobot signature,
> > and gets Rat Trap's readilly=
.
> 
> Lord elder nodded as he brought the shuttle as close as he dared to
=
> the Black Fortress! He knew how powerful this demesne of the Predacons
> =
could be. Designed to hold off an assault, Lord Elder knew his plan
> was r=
isky. He could only hope that Rat Trap had been able to do
> something on h=
is side.
> 
> > "Sir, I've locked in on Rat Trap's signature.... And yes, I=
 do
> > see a faint but very faint Autobot signature... It's a bit weaker
>=
 > than normal... Which Oh wow, sir, that Autobot seems to be
> > using a b=
ackup battery... Not good... Because when he loses
> > that he's done for."=

> 
> "Confirmed." he said as he also saw the same things on his scanner.
>=
 "The sensors also show several Decepticon and Predacon signatures
> around=
 them, if we don't do something Tuscon and Rat trap would be
> destroyed an=
yway." With deft fingers he brought the weapons energy
> cannons online and=
 quickly brought them to bear on the fortress.
> 
> "Hold onto your seat, t=
his is going to get rough!" Elder said as he
> transferred power from the e=
ngines to the gunnery platform, in other
> words throwing everything the sh=
uttle had at the Fortress!
> 
> The shuttle shook for a moment as its fore =
cannons glowed and then
> spewed out a massive burst of energy that bathed =
the fortress in pure
> destructive power!
> 
> Back inside the Fortress the=
 very base shook as it absorbed the
> massive onslaught from the Autobot sh=
uttle! The lights flickered as
> energy fields went down.
> 
> Cyclonus, Sc=
ourge and Rodimus were knocked off their feet and
> Scorponok was sent sail=
ing back into the torture chamber as the world
> inside the Fortress went c=
ompletely dark for a moment and then winked
> back on dimly as emergency li=
ghts came online.
> 
> An alert sounded, it would be only be less than 30 s=
econds before the
> Fortress' computer reset the system and brought itself =
and all the
> bases' systems back on line!
> 
> Meanwhile outside Lord Elde=
r struggle frantically to redirect the
> shuttle's energy from the weapons =
and back to the engines, as the
> shuttle at the moment was falling from th=
e skies, looking less like
> the elegant flying machine it was and more lik=
e a brick!
> 
> (OOC: I wrote in the affected to the Fortress with Airly's =
permission)
> 
> (TAG)
> 
> Preston
> (Cyclonus & Scourge/Scorponok/Rodimus=
/Lord Elder)
>
